EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Event_CFPlatform_Q214.Sales Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Be our Guest - Cloud Foundry Summit, San Francisco
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://cfsummit.com/> Hello!
This yearâ€™s Cloud Foundry <http://cfsummit.com/>Summit on June 9-11 in San Francisco is filling up fast! And as an important collaborator, we like you to be a part of this year's premier event to share information, exchange ideas and influence the future direction of Open Platform-as-a-Service.
You can go to the Summit for Free as Pivotal's guest.
Simply use code CFS2014-Customer here >> <https://2014.event.cfsummit.com/register>
Join core contributors, fellow customers and Cloud Foundry Foundation members such as IBM, HP, NTT, and ActiveState to learn and share:
- Join Pivotal CF customers Monsanto, CoreLogic, Philips, Axel Springer & more - New case studies - Engineering roadmap - Technical architecture and implementation details - Hack Night - get hands on with Cloud Foundry
Check out the agenda >> <https://2014.event.cfsummit.com/schedule>
We look forward to seeing you at the Summit!
Team Cloud Foundry #cfsummit
